column1: I salute each one of these doctors for risking their lives to save our nation from Corona crisis. These martyrs braved adversities & hardships but never gave up. My condolences to those who have the honour of calling them their family & friends.
Whether Noteban , GST or Corona Common Man has always paid price of BJP blunders and lies !

9 camps in NE Mumbai today of SanjeevniApkeDwar 4 camps in Bhandup 3 in Ghatkopar and 2 in Powai. As we step forward to  ji's dream of VaccineForAll , we will vaccinate 4k plus NE Mumbaikars today.Remember, teeka se hoga corona feeka.
